## Project Description
An app that shows mountain shelters (rifugi) and bivouacs near the user's location with search and map functionality.

## Key Features Implemented
- Searchable list of 15 mountain shelters in Italian Alps
- Interactive Google Maps with markers
- Detailed view with shelter information
- Location permissions handling
- Settings and donations pages
- Mountain-themed design (greens, blues, browns)
- Provider state management

## Next Steps to Run the App
1. Configure Google Maps API Key (see GOOGLE_MAPS_SETUP.md)
2. Run: `flutter run`
